Mega Cloud provides personalized, omnichannel customer support from a single interface through our cloud-based contact center solution. Some of the attractive features of Mega Cloud are:

1. Omnichannel Management

2. Future-Proofed Contact Center

3.Chatbots with Text-to-Speech Capabilties

4.Workforce Management Integration

5.Built-In AI Routing Two-Way Messaging
Through Omnichannel Management, connect any and all customer communication channels you need at any time, providing a seamless customer journey regardless of how they choose to contact your business.
Future-Proofed Contact Center feature allows you to create and modify channels easily, always having complete ownership of your customer interaction data across all channels.

patterns: Chatbots with Text to Speech Capabilties
responses: Advanced AI-based chatbots enable you to automatically respond to basic inquiries, allowing agents to focus on more complex inquiries and for you to fielda higher volume of calls and chats.
Use Workforce Management Integration feature to optimize existing contact center and platforms like workforce management software and third party planning and operations tools.

With Built-In AI Routing feature, choose to turn on our complimentary AI routing soolution at any time to match your customers with agents with compatible behavioral characteristics, driving measurably better outcomes.
Through Two-Way Messaging feature, increase responsiveness by easily sending and respoonding to customer inquiries.

A few of many agent deskop features are:

1. See the full picture with contextual details about customer history and preferences

2. Manage all conversations in one streamlined interface. Field inbound messages or place outbound calls using a personalized directory

3. View and track individual agent performance metrics like AHT, FCR, and more

Mega Cloud is available in three flavors at a variety of affordable price points.

1. Free - $0/mo

2. Premium - $99/mo

3. Platinum - $170/mo
